name: INTERLINKED (noodle3)
description:
Theme: An end is a new beginning

Controls 

A / D - Move

Space - Jump / Flip

E - Interact

R - Restart Level

Escape - Pauses the game

Concept

A 2D Puzzle Platformer where you play every level twice. After completing it with the first character you will play as another character with different movements and abilities. The solution for each level is therefore different the second time around. Also, be careful to leave a path that the second player can solve as to not make it impossible for Player 2 to finish the

Background

This game was created in 7 days as part of "Brackeys GameJam 2023". The theme was an end is a new beginning and after a bit of brainstorming I came up with the concept of a puzzle platformer where you play every level twice, and have the layout of the level change after completing it once. I lost a lot of time due to events in real life that caused me to not be able to spend as much time as I'd liked on the project but overall I'm happy with the concept and execution.
